author: Google Inc.
name: gtfs-realtime-bindings-transit
description: Javascript classes generated from the GTFS-realtime protocol buffer specification.

scripts.buildProto: npm run buildProto:cjs && npm run buildProto:esm
scripts.buildProto:cjs: pbjs -t static-module -w commonjs -o gtfs-realtime.js ../transit-extensions.proto && pbts -o types.d.ts gtfs-realtime.js && npm run fixLongImport:cjs
scripts.buildProto:esm: pbjs -t static-module -w es6 -o gtfs-realtime.mjs ../transit-extensions.proto && npm run fixDefaultExport:esm && cp gtfs-realtime.mjs gtfs-realtime-esm.js && pbts -o types.d.mts gtfs-realtime-esm.js && rm gtfs-realtime-esm.js && npm run fixLongImport:esm
scripts.fixLongImport:cjs: sed -i.bak 's/import Long = require("long");/import { Long } from "protobufjs";/' types.d.ts && rm types.d.ts.bak
scripts.fixLongImport:esm: sed -i.bak 's/import Long = require("long");/import { Long } from "protobufjs";/' types.d.mts && rm types.d.mts.bak
scripts.fixDefaultExport:esm: sed -i.bak 's/export { \$root as default };/export default \$root;/' gtfs-realtime.mjs && rm gtfs-realtime.mjs.bak
